com.avaje.ebean.dbmigration.ddlgeneration.platform

Class PlatformDdl

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.avaje.ebean.dbmigration.ddlgeneration.platform.PlatformDdl
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    DB2Ddl, H2Ddl, HsqldbDdl, MsSqlServerDdl, MySqlDdl, Oracle10Ddl, PostgresDdl, SQLiteDdl

    public class PlatformDdl
extends Object
    Controls the DDL generation for a specific database platform.

        public String alterTableDropUniqueConstraint(String tableName,
                                             String uniqueConstraintName)
        Drop a unique constraint from the table.

      • alterTableAddUniqueConstraint

        public String alterTableAddUniqueConstraint(String tableName,
                                            String uqName,
                                            String[] columns)
        Add a unique constraint to the table.

        Overridden by MsSqlServer for specific null handling on unique constraints.

      • isInlineUniqueOneToOne

        public boolean isInlineUniqueOneToOne()
        Return true if unique constraints for OneToOne can be inlined as normal. Returns false for MsSqlServer due to it's null handling for unique constraints.

      • alterColumnType

        public String alterColumnType(String tableName,
                              String columnName,
                              String type)
        Alter a column type.

        Note that that MySql and SQL Server instead use alterColumnBaseAttributes()

      • alterColumnNotnull

        public String alterColumnNotnull(String tableName,
                                 String columnName,
                                 boolean notnull)
        Alter a column adding or removing the not null constraint.

        Note that that MySql and SQL Server instead use alterColumnBaseAttributes()

      • isDropDefault

        public boolean isDropDefault(String defaultValue)
        Return true if the default value is the special DROP DEFAULT value.

      • alterColumnDefaultValue

        public String alterColumnDefaultValue(String tableName,
                                      String columnName,
                                      String defaultValue)
        Alter column setting the default value.

      • alterColumnBaseAttributes

        public String alterColumnBaseAttributes(AlterColumn alter)
        Alter column setting both the type and not null constraint.

        Used by MySql and SQL Server as these require both column attributes to be set together.

      • appendColumns

        protected void appendColumns(String[] columns,
                             StringBuilder buffer)

      • appendWithSpace

        protected void appendWithSpace(String content,
                               StringBuilder buffer)

      • lowerName

        protected String lowerName(String name)
        Convert the table or column name to lower case.

        This is passed up to the platformDdl to override as desired. Generally lower case with underscore is a good cross database choice for column/table names.

      • isTrue

        protected boolean isTrue(Boolean value)
        Null safe Boolean true test.
